text: This year I was graduated in a computer science degree. I was exposed to a lot of courses. One of them that was picked is object detection. It really inspired me and make me think how can it be integrated in our life in an efficient way or even to make it working for experience. What I'm looking for and start to search and looking up for is object tracking to label the movement and the position of the body to analyze and make it better for us to understand and get some insight of things that are subconscious.

traits.details: The text shows a creative and imaginative approach to applying object detection and object tracking to real-life scenarios, with a focus on integrating technology to improve human experience and gain subconscious insights, indicating a moderate level of imagination and creative thinking.
